channel.title: 2023 on Tardigrade's dev blog
channel.description: Recent content in 2023 on Tardigrade's dev blog

item.title: [Game Boy] Logic Island
item.description: Logic Island Logic Island is my first homebrew game for the original Game Boy, yay! Download : https://tardigrade-nx.itch.io/logic-island Logic Island a Picross-like logic puzzle game for the original Game Boy, inspired by Nikoli’s Nurikabe. Nurikabe is one of my favorite games of all times. This is my version of it, with graphics hopefully a little more elaborate than a simple grid. The rules may not be as simple as Picross at first, but it’s worth it: once you know how to play, the game becomes very addictive, with a lot of depth and strategies to offer.

item.title: [Retro] RetroAchievements
item.description: RetroAchievements https://retroachievements.org/ is a zero profit community who collaborate and compete to earn custom-made achievements in classic games through emulation. Achievements are made by and for the community. I’m a RetroAchievements user and developer. Here is my RetroAchievements page: https://retroachievements.org/user/Tardigrade Here are the RetroAchievements sets I’ve created: https://retroachievements.org/gameList.php?d=Tardigrade
